taskbody.context: To copy additional resources to the output directory using a transformation scenario from Oxygen XML Editor/Author, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Create a new publishing template. Skip this step you have already one.
Place all your resources in the directory associated with the publishing template. You can create a new one, custom-resources for instance.
Open the template descriptor associated with your publishing template. If you are not familiar with concept, you can follow the edit a publishing template procedure.
Add a new fileset element in resources section of the template descriptor.
Open the DITA Map WebHelp Responsive transformation scenario.
Use the Choose Custom Publishing Template and select your newly created template.
Click OK to save the changes to the transformation scenario.

result.p: All files from the custom resources directory will be copied to the /oxygen-webhelp/template folder.
